events.name: ID Hack
events.about:
Technology is powerful. Powerful enough to help solve poverty. Come to ID Hack to join a community of developers using technology to develop practical solutions that can reform the world of international development. With organizations like PeaceCorps, Sana, and sponsors from Microsoft, Dropbox, Athenahealth, Healthbox, and Kyruus, you wont want to miss out!

First 100 participants receive 5GB of free Dropbox space.Best designs will receive 50 GB of Dropbox space and prize awards of either $500, $400, $200, or $150.

Networking, making a different in the world, and great prizes... 

...ID Hack, wouldnt you?

 

More information: https://sites.google.com/site/idhack2013/home
